La alcaldesa de Tampa, Jane Castor, afirm√≥ durante una rueda de prensa la ma√±ana de mi√©rcoles que los uniformados lograron "rescatar" al hombre. "Si logramos que el 'teniente Dan' fuera a un refugio, podemos lograr que cualquiera lo haga", declar√≥ durante una rueda de prensa la tarde de mi√©rcoles. No obstante, result√≥ que Malinowski permaneci√≥ en su bote. I know the Mayor of Tampa just said in her press conference that Lieutenant Dan went to a shelter. ‚Äî Brian Entin (@BrianEntin) He didn‚Äôt, I‚Äôm standing right here.[https://t.co/Wv6NleShNW][pic.twitter.com/40c7aLqI9B][October 9, 2024] Just went over to check on Lieutenant Dan during a break in the weather - he just cut one of his lines because he said his boat was hitting the wall but he‚Äôs ok. ‚Äî Brian Entin (@BrianEntin)[pic.twitter.com/ud99i3akbF][October 9, 2024] Hang in there, Lieutenant Dan!
